document_data.mainbody:
ajeed was a earth genasi caravanner and guard leader who lived in the land of Turmish during the late 15 century DR.
Both his eyes and the lines that patterned his skin shone a bright gold color.
While working with the caravan master Faroz, Majeed was put in charge of commanding their groups guardsmen.
In the , Majeed was present on the caravan journey that saw his company pick up four travelers, each of whom was the chosen do a different Faer√ªnian deity. He helped lead their defense against orc raiders, and shades of Netheril.
